title: Unstoppable Domains
about-unstoppable: Replace cryptocurrency addresses with a human readable name.
dapp-desc: Buy a .crypto domain or manage your .crypto domains
insufficient-balance: Insufficient balance: Add more ETH to your wallet or pay with Credit Card
confirm-payment: You are about to pay ${amount} for {numberDomains} domains

error.stripe-payment: Payment failed. Please try again later
error.something-went-wrong: Something went wrong! Please try again.

warning.not-enough-char: Domain name is less than 6 characters.
warning.invalid-symbol: Invalid symbols on domain. Please use alphanumerical or '-' characters
warning.too-small: File is too small! Size has to be more than 500kb.
warning.too-big: File is too big! Size has to be less than 50mb.

ipfs.processing-description: Please wait for a transaction popup before you leave to make sure your request is processed. After this, you don't have to save your new hash as it has already been saved..
ipfs.see-website: To see your site, please visit {domainName} on Unstoppable Chrome Extension or Unstoppable's Browser. You can also open the link on Opera browser!

view-transfer-transaction: You can view the transfer transaction on
domain-transferring-two: is being transferred to your wallet with address: {address}!
transfer-complete: has been successfully transferred to your wallet
manage-on-one: This process may take up to 5-10 minutes. You may stay on this page to receive a confirmation when the transaction has been completed. View and manage your domain on
manage-on-two: by creating an account and connecting your wallet!
complete-manage-on-one: View and manage your domain on
following-been-claimed: The following domains have been claimed
no-crypto-domains-one: Looks like you don't own any .crypto domains yet! Get your .crypto domain
